title: Global Investors Turn to China Stocks, Yuan in Big Bets for 2026
description: Investors are ramping up bets on China’s stocks and currency as 2026 kicks off, signaling a more decisive shift into the country’s assets at a time of rising global uncertainties.
content: Investors are ramping up bets on China’s stocks and currency as 2026 kicks off, signaling a more decisive shift into the country’s assets at a time of rising global uncertainties.
